  gh::gh(
    "/repos/:owner/:repo/contents/:path",
    owner = "markjrieke",
    repo = "2024-potus",
    path = "R/site",
    ref = params$branch
  )

# source files from link
for (i in 1:length(files)) {
  source(files[i][[1]]$download_url)
}
